name: Build a School
description: Construct a new school to improve education in the area. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Train Teachers
description: Provide training for local teachers to improve education quality. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Provide Scholarships
description: Offer scholarships to students to encourage higher education. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Build a Library
description: Construct a library to provide access to educational resources. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Develop Online Learning Platform
description: Create an online platform for remote learning. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Provide School Supplies
description: Distribute school supplies to students in need. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Upgrade School Facilities
description: Renovate and upgrade existing school facilities. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Organize Science Fair
description: Host a science fair to encourage student innovation. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Provide After-School Programs
description: Offer after-school programs to support student development. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

name: Build a Community Center
description: Construct a community center for educational workshops. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

description: Provide small loans to local entrepreneurs. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.

description: Construct a bank to support financial services. Requires {m} ZAR and {p} people.
